messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Grace Llewellyn's Not Back To School Camps
messages.msgSnippet: ... from ... We have quite a few friends who are campers - Cacie just spent a lovely evening with two of them (one visiting from Canada) making People Piles.
messages.messageBody:
> mariedotcom wrote:
> >
> > Hi, I'm new to this forum. I'm curious to know if anyone out there
> > has had their kids attend Grace Llewellyn's camp in Oregon. I'm
from
> > the Northeast and aware that she is starting up a new camp this year
> > in Virginia. I have a 12 1/2 year old son who might consider it in
> > the future if it sounds good. Any feedback? --

We have quite a few friends who are campers - Cacie just spent a lovely
evening with two of them (one visiting from Canada) making People Piles.
She can't wait until she's old enough to go. I've heard nothing but rave
reviews from all the teens I know.

Dar

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Grace Llewellyn's Not Back To School Camps
messages.msgSnippet: ... Marie, If there aren t any members here whose children attend the camp, another list does have several members whose children have attended.  The Home-Ed
messages.messageBody:
mariedotcom wrote:
>
> Hi, I'm new to this forum. I'm curious to know if anyone out there
> has had their kids attend Grace Llewellyn's camp in Oregon. I'm from
> the Northeast and aware that she is starting up a new camp this year
> in Virginia. I have a 12 1/2 year old son who might consider it in
> the future if it sounds good. Any feedback? --Marie
>

Marie,
If there aren't any members here whose children attend the camp, another
list does have several members whose children have attended. The Home-Ed
list is a general homeschooling list with a lot of unschoolers on it.
For more information, check out http://www.madrone.com/Home-ed/helist.html

I hope you stay here with us too! Welcome to unschooling-dotcom!!

--

Cindy Ferguson
crma@...

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Grace Llewellyn's Not Back To School  Camps
messages.msgSnippet: ... I know a bunch of young people who have gone and loved it.  I have another friend whose daughter is going to go this year for the first time and is really
messages.messageBody:
>Hi, I'm new to this forum. I'm curious to know if anyone out there
>has had their kids attend Grace Llewellyn's camp in Oregon. I'm from
>the Northeast and aware that she is starting up a new camp this year
>in Virginia. I have a 12 1/2 year old son who might consider it in
>the future if it sounds good. Any feedback? --Marie

I know a bunch of young people who have gone and loved it. I have another
friend whose daughter is going to go this year for the first time and is
really excited. I've heard that they might not get enough kids for the
Northeast one, so even if your son wouldn't be going this year, you might
want to let them know that you'd be interested in the eastern one for the
future.
Tia

No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt
*********************************************
Tia Leschke
leschke@...
On Vancouver Island

messages.subject: Grace Llewellyn's Not Back To School Camps
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I m new to this forum.  I m curious to know if anyone out there has had their kids attend Grace Llewellyn s camp in Oregon.  I m from the Northeast and
messages.messageBody:
Hi, I'm new to this forum. I'm curious to know if anyone out there
has had their kids attend Grace Llewellyn's camp in Oregon. I'm from
the Northeast and aware that she is starting up a new camp this year
in Virginia. I have a 12 1/2 year old son who might consider it in
the future if it sounds good. Any feedback? --Marie
